title: Problem-Based Language Competency Enhancement Program for Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of language structure and ability to use job-related vocabulary
context.additional_context: Program for Professionals in Medical, Legal, and Technical Fields to Solve Linguistic Challenges in Real Work Environments: Blended Learning with Digital Devices and Project-Based Assessment

learning_goals: Learners can derive solutions to over 80% of complex language problems encountered in real work situations through problem-based learning (PBL) tasks
Learners can improve their language use strategies three or more times by reflecting on peer feedback
Learners can recognize limitations of existing knowledge and perceive the need to acquire new linguistic resources at over 90% while performing tasks embedded with intellectual needs
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
